record.english: Please give me the change if you have
record.kannadaenglish: Dayvittu nimma hatthira chillare iddhare kodi
record.kannada: ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಹತ್ತಿರ ಚಿಲ್ಲರೆ ಇದ್ದರೆ ಕೊಡಿ

record.english: Please take I will give you remaining change afterwards
record.kannadaenglish: Dayavittu thagoli innu ulida chillare amele kodthini
record.kannada: ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು ತಗೊಳಿ ಇನ್ನು ಉಳಿದ ಚಿಲ್ಲರೆ ಆಮೇಲೆ ಕೊಡ್ತೀನಿ

record.english: Give me 2 full tickets and 1 half ticket
If anybody have Bus pass please show the pass !
Show me your ID card please?
Please sign on the Bus pass if you have not signed
record.kannadaenglish: Dayavittu Bus pass mele sahi madade iroru sahi maadi
record.kannada: ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು ಬಸ್ ಪಾಸ್ ಮೇಲೆ ಸಹಿ ಮಾಡದೆ ಇರೋರು ಸಹಿ ಮಾಡಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ

record.english: Ticket checking will be there please ask and take the ticket
record.kannadaenglish: ticket parisheelana irutthade dayavittu ticket keli padeyiri
record.kannada: ಟಿಕೆಟ್ ಪರಿಶೀಲನೆ ಇರುತ್ತದೆ ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು ಟಿಕೆಟ್ ಕೇಳಿ ಪಡೆಯಿರಿ

record.english: Those who are inside please move little more
record.kannadaenglish: Olage iroru dayavittu inna swalpa olagade sarkoli
record.kannada: ಒಳಗೆ ಇರೋರು ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು ಇನ್ನೂ ಸ್ವಲ್ಪ ಒಳಗಡೆ ಸರಿದುಕೊಳ್ಳಿ

record.english: Matthikere Matthikere, Anybody wants to get down
Do you want to get down here?
Yes I want to get down here!
Will this Bus go to yelahanka?
Yes this Bus will go to yelahanka!
Will this Bus go to Doddaballapura?
No this Bus will not go to Doddaballapura
Still how many stops are there to reach Vidhyaranyapura?
record.kannadaenglish: Innu yestu nildaanagalu idave Vidhyaranyapura baroke?
record.kannada: ಇನ್ನೂ ಎಷ್ಟು ನಿಲ್ದಾಣಗಳು ಇದಾವೆ ವಿದ್ಯಾರಣ್ಯಪುರ ಬರೋಕೆ

record.english: Please inform me when that stop comes
How far is Yelahanka from Yeshwanthpura
Conductor you haven't given the change yet
How much change I have to give you?
You have to give me 54rs change
Who are yet to get change?
Who have not got the change yet please ask
record.kannadaenglish: Yaarige innu chillare bandilla dayavittu keli
record.kannada: ಯಾರಿಗೆ ಇನ್ನೂ ಚಿಲ್ಲರೆ ಬಂದಿಲ್ಲ ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು ಕೇಳಿ

record.english: Who wants to get down in next stop please come to door
record.kannadaenglish: Mundina nildaanadalli iliyoru dayavittu baagila hatthira banni
record.kannada: ಮುಂದಿನ ನಿಲ್ದಾಣ ಇಳಿಯೋರು ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು ಬಾಗಿಲ ಹತ್ತಿರ ಬನ್ವಿ

record.english: Nobody should stand on the board please
record.kannadaenglish: Dayavittu yaaru halage mele nilluva haagilla
record.kannada: ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು ಯಾರು ಹಲಗೆ ಮೇಲೆ ನಿಲ್ಲುವ ಹಾಗಿಲ್ಲ

record.english: Those who are there to get down in last stop go to end please
record.kannadaenglish: Kone nildaanadalli iliyoru konege hogi dayavittu
record.kannada: ಕೊನೇ ನಿಲ್ದಾಣದಲ್ಲಿ ಇಳಿಯೋರು ಕೊನೇಗೆ ಹೋಗಿ ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು

record.english: Oh too much of traffic was there
Yeah today have lot of work
Sir yesterday this much work has been done
This much of work is yet to be done
Whats the plan for today Mr. Hegde
Sir today we are planning to do this much of work
record.kannadaenglish: Sir ivatthu ishtu kelasavannu madabeku andhkondidhivi

record.english: Yeah I am free now! Tell me
Can you do a favour for me?
Yeah tell me! what can I do for you?
Can you this part of work for me?
record.kannadaenglish: Ee bhagada kelsavannu maadi kodtheera nanagoskara?

record.english: This part of work is to be finished within 1'o clock
record.kannadaenglish: 1 ghanteya olage ee bhagada kelasa mugiyabeku

record.english: No no i will only do it!
Come lets go for a coffee!
Finish the work as soon as possible
record.kannadaenglish: Yesthtu saadhya aguttho ashtu jaldi kelasa mugisi

record.english: This part of work is finished
How much of work is still pending?
Only this much of work remaining
record.kannadaenglish: Innu ishtu kelasa maathra baaki idhe

record.english: Sir today the reaming work has been done
record.kannadaenglish: Sir ivatthu ulidha kelasavannu mugisi aagidhe

record.english: No I will not come that side
Yes I will come, 100 RS will be the fare
No I will not put meter
No I will give only 70 RS, Are you ready to come or not?
record.kannadaenglish: Illa, Naanu 20 RS ashte koduttene. Barutteera illavaa?

record.english: Where you want to go in Jayanagar?
I want to go Sapna Book House
record.kannadaenglish: Naanu sapna book house ge hogabeku

record.english: This is Sapna Book House, Please get down
record.kannadaenglish: Ide sapna book house. Dayavittu iliyiri

record.english: Do you have 5 RS? (After you giving 100 RS)
record.kannadaenglish: Aidu roopayi chillare ideya (Neevu nooru roopayi kotta nantara)?

record.english: Yes I have Take it (If you have 5 RS)
record.kannadaenglish: Howdu ide. Tegedukolli (Nimma hattira aidu roopayi chillare iddare)

record.english: No I don’t have (If you don’t have 5 RS)
record.kannadaenglish: Illa nanna hattira illa (Nimma hattira aidu roopayi chillare illade iddaga)

record.english: What is teh final price for this?
I will take that one also
How much do I owe you?
Sorry we don't accept credit card

record.kannadaenglish: Nannalli/ nan hatra bekada hana illa.

record.english: The big one or the small one?
I would like to buy this
I would like to return this

record.kannadaenglish: Ninnalli idakke bekadashtu hana/ duddu/ kaasu ideya?

record.english: Can I pay by credit card?
When did you arrive in Bangalore?
